description.ko: 영원한 어둠과 미지의 해양 생물들 사이에서 한 줄기 빛으로 우뚝 선 아쿠아-5와 함께 압도적인 수심의 미드나잇 존으로 내려가 보세요.
description.en: Descend into the crushing depths of the midnight zone where AQUA-5 stands as a beacon of light amidst eternal darkness and undiscovered marine life.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the AQUA-5 underwater facility submerged in the deepest trench of the ocean, glowing bioluminescent coral reefs, mysterious giant sea creatures swimming in the distance, dark navy and neon cyan color palette, volumetric lighting rays piercing through the dark water, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, intricate details.
